description: Gameloft is a French video game publisher that was founded in 1999. Many of the publisher's more recent video games, particularly those published for mobile devices, include BCLARA and BLIBCLARA files. These files are game data files that were originally created in the CLARA and LIBCLARA formats, using Gameloft's proprietary Clara game design software, before being binarized and distributed within finished video games.
The following Gameloft games are known to use BCLARA files:
